fields.name: CreatedDate
fields.description: The creation date of the disk.

fields.name: DiskBlobName
fields.description: When backed by a blob, the name of the VHD blob without extension.

fields.name: DiskSizeGiB
fields.description: The size of the disk in Gibibytes.

fields.name: DiskType
fields.description: The storage type for the disk (i.e. Standard, Premium).

fields.name: DiskUri
fields.description: When backed by a blob, the URI of underlying blob.

fields.name: HostCaching
fields.description: The host caching policy of the disk (i.e. None, ReadOnly, ReadWrite).

fields.name: LeasedByLabVMId
fields.description: The resource ID of the VM to which this disk is leased.

fields.name: ManagedDiskId
fields.description: When backed by managed disk, this is the ID of the compute disk resource.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: The provisioning status of the resource.

fields.name: StorageAccountId
fields.description: When backed by a blob, the storage account where the blob is.

fields.name: UniqueIdentifier
fields.description: The unique immutable identifier of a resource (Guid).
